name: Pixel Line Defense
description:
Submitted for Nokia 3310 Jam 4.

Pixel Line Defense

Monsters are gathering to enter the kingdom. Your cannons guards the borders and you only have limited ammo. How many can you kill and how many will get past your defenses?

Gameplay

Use your cannons to shoot enemy monsters going into your kingdom. Remember to watch those cannonballs left. Your damage increase for every 10 monster you kill. But don’t underestimate them, they get stronger each wave.

Controls
  • 1,2 and 3 to trigger the gun with the assigned number.
  • ESC to pause
  • Enter/SPC to select menus
